channel.title: [PI] Players invisible to eachother
channel.description: Well i added in a new donator status to my server and now who ever logs in after another person, can't see the person who was there before them. And if they walk over eachother, it says Null (Level - 0). How can i fix this???

item.title: [PI] Players invisible to eachother
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

i’m not big on modding loading/saving, but i know they need to be in the same order. the copy of the loading order and saving order would be of great use o.o you did add the line for it to load it right?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Players invisible to eachother
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

it may only be a problem by where you put it, like putting it in the middle of the character-equip = bad >.> im not sure if that would cause invisible people, but try moving it around =P and check your character files. see if there is anything strange in them. if you can post one of them [remove name and password though]

i got a feeling your server dosnt know how to load the character file anymore, like you added that BEFORE all of the character data, or you added it in 2 different spots in the saving vs the loading. the null name would be caused by not getting a name assigned to it- invisible people by not getting the character design initiated correctly. this would be only if what I’m guessing is happening though.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Players invisible to eachother
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Thats the problem. But after awhile the client started giving me T1 Errors… and i originally fixed them. could it be client sided?

Read full topic

and characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("isSuperDonator = ", 0, 17); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.isSuperDonator), 0, Integer .toString(p.isSuperDonator).length());
